title: Frontend Engineer (ReactJS)
description:
About the job
Company Overview

At Gaditek, our talent is not just exceptional - it's world-class! Our unstoppable team of 800+ employees is the best and the brightest, driving innovation across 7 Global SaaS Brands in 6 hottest industries, including Cyber Security, Digital Media, Managed Cloud, Affiliate Marketing, E-Commerce, Web.3.0, and Venture Building as a Service.

Our team is made up of dreamers, doers, and all-around rockstars who are committed to making a difference. As a result, we‚Äôre among the best companies to work for, with a plethora of benefits and an amazing culture.



We seek a talented Mid-Level Front-End Developer with strong React.js experience to join our growing team. As a Front-End Developer, you will collaborate with our design, product, and backend teams to build interactive, responsive, and efficient web applications. You will be key in creating user-facing features that deliver excellent user experiences, leveraging the latest tools and technologies.



2+ years of professional experience in front-end development.

Strong proficiency in React.js and JavaScript (ES6+).

Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind and responsive web design.

Experience with state management libraries like Redux, Context API, or similar.

Familiarity with modern build tools and package managers such as Vite, Babel, npm, or Yarn.

Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.

Understanding of RESTful APIs and integrating front-end applications with backend services.

Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills.



2+ years of experience in front-end development, with a strong focus on React.js.

Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, and experience working with Tailwind for UI styling.

Hands-on experience with state management solutions like Redux or Context API.

Familiarity with front-end build tools (Vite, Babel) and package managers (npm, Yarn).

Experience with RESTful APIs and integrating front-end applications with backend services.

Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.



Detail-oriented with a passion for clean, efficient code.

Able to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment while managing multiple priorities.

Proactive and self-motivated, always seeking ways to improve your work and the overall product.

A lifelong learner who stays updated on new technologies and trends in front-end development.

A team player who enjoys collaborating with designers, product managers, and other developers.



Team Structure: You will work closely with the design, product, and backend development teams.

Performance Metrics: Your success will be measured based on code quality, user experience, and timely delivery of features.

Growth Opportunities: As a mid-level developer, you'll have opportunities to mentor junior developers and potentially grow into senior technical or leadership roles.
company_about:
We increase the market value of our people by serving opportunities that justify their choosing to invest in us their time and energy. We do this by equipping them with skillsets and mindsets that make them relevant in this disruptive age. Currently we are present in cloud, gaming, security, retail, lifestyle and e commerce industries respectively.Visit www.gaditek.com for more info.

title: Associate Frontend Engineer (Fresh Graduates)
description:
About the job
VIDIZMO, a USA company headquartered in Tysons, Virginia, is a Microsoft Gold Applications & Cloud Partner recognized in Gartner Magic Quadrant for Enterprise Video Content Management.

We provide cutting-edge technology solutions for Fortune 500 companies, large, medium-sized enterprises, and the public sector across the globe. To maintain the best customer experience with our product, service, and support, we are looking to hire qualified, dedicated, and self-motivated candidates who can help us further our business mission, i.e., to deliver highly innovative technology solutions while always putting our customers first.

Currently, we are looking for a ‚ÄòFront End Engineer‚Äô with a strong eye for design & will drive end-to-end development and be responsible for the production, modification, and maintenance of our company‚Äôs brand, creating the most effective experience for potential and current customers.













Benefits: Health Insurance (OPD/IPD), Daily Lunch Facility, Separate Maternity Cover, Leave encashment, Car Support Program, Referral Bonus, EOBI, Bi-Annual Increment. Provident Fund, Career Growth, Bonus (benefits vary based on location)
